==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|魔|人}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|まじん}}

# a [[person]] who has some [[supernatural]] [[power]] or [[ability]]

====Usage notes====
Sometimes glossed as [[magician]], [[sorcerer]], or [[conjurer]]. However, the term {{lang|ja|魔人}} is much more broad, and these English terms are more appropriately rendered in Japanese as {{ja-l|魔法使い||mahō tsukai}} or {{ja-l|魔術師||majutsushi}}.
